LanguageData.CollapsedRocks.label: romahtaneita kiviä
LanguageData.CollapsedRocks.description: Romahtaneita kiviä pakattuna tarpeeksi tiukalle kannattelemaan kattoa.
LanguageData.MineableSteel.label: pakkautunutta terästä
LanguageData.MineableSteel.description: Jonkin muinaisen raunion jäännökset. Sisältää paljon terästä.

LanguageData.MineableGold.label: kultamalmi

LanguageData.MineablePlasteel.label: pakkautunutta muoviterästä
LanguageData.MineableJade.label: jade
LanguageData.MineableComponents.label: compacted machinery
LanguageData.MineableComponents.description: Ancient machinery, compacted over time. Can be mined for useful components.
LanguageData.SteamGeyser.label: geysir
LanguageData.Hive.label: hive
LanguageData.Hive.description: A bug hive. Will spawn additional bugs and hives over time.
LanguageData.GlowPod.label: glow pod
LanguageData.GlowPod.description: A bioluminescent pod produced by giant insects. Glows under its own light for a long time, then dies.
LanguageData.GlowPod_Blueprint_Install.label: glow pod (blueprint)
